resources.string: *Works only after new router setup. If you already setup your router, it is not necessary to repeat.
SELECT QUANTITY OF ETHERNET PORTS IN YOUR ROUTER

Please make sure that you connected to the router with default settings. After clicking \"I AGREE\" the app will divide ethernet ports of your router (from ETH2) to separate networks. Configuration will be possible only over WiFi. Please wait about two minutes. After closing the application by itself, reconnect to WiFi with password \"itremedy\", open the app again and connect to the router with password \"itremedy.online\". After that you could set the connection speed on ports of the router.

DON\'T TOUCH ANYTHING!\n Wait until the app is closed (usually from 1 to 5 minutes) then reconnect to WiFi with password \"itremedy\" (without quotes), start the app, enter password \"itremedy.online\" (without quotes) and connect, using button CONNECT, to your router. Print it in the Password field. IP, Port and username will stay the same. After that you could set the connection speed on ports of the router.

This application is intended for controlling MikroTik routers. Using it you can control speed limits of the ethernet ports of the router.
	 If you've got new one turn it on, put the internet cable to the first port and connect to WiFi network that was created. Usually it calls "MikroTik-*****". If you also have "MikroTik-****A" don't use it this time or you'll have no WiFi security.
	 If you already use Mikrotik router, don't forget to backup configuration, do factory reset and read previous paragraph.
	 We are not responsible for any harm that was done by using this application.
